column4: I wish to change perl for activeperl into my linbox but I need help to do it.
Well, Exist any script to switch between perl and activeperl?
er... why do you want activePerl?  I didnt even know they mad eactivePerl for !win
Because I have a problem with CPAN modules configuration. I prefer use ppm that 'perl -MCPAN -e shell'...
